original_text: Throughout the generations to come you are to give this offering to the Lord from the first of your ground meal.
korean_text: 너희의 처음 익은 곡식 가루 떡을 대대에 여호와께 거제로 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: you are to give this offering
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 제물을 드려야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: from the first of your ground meal
